T02D2339:304b-3: bdag gi rnal 'byor zhes bya ba /
T02D2339:304b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2339:304b-5: rnal 'byor spyod la mkhas pa yis //
T02D2339:304b-6: sems can rnams la rjes brtse bas //
T02D2339:304b-7: dngos grub ched du las sgrub thabs //
T02D2339:304b-8: de nas de la yang dag bshad //
T02D2339:304b-9: 'jig rten thar la ba rten phyir yang //
T02D2339:304b-10: 'khor lo drug gi cho ga dang //
T02D2339:304b-11: de bzhin las sbyor cho ga yis //
T02D2339:304b-12: las kyi sgrub thabs mchog bya'o //
T02D2339:304b-13: gang zhig rnam par shes tsam gyis //
T02D2339:304b-14: sangs rgyas nyid ni nges 'thob pa //
T02D2339:304b-15: bdag nyid kyi ni sgrub thabs mchog / de phyir de las bshad par bya //
T02D2339:304b-16: dang por re zhig bshad lam nas //
T02D2339:304b-17: sum mdo ru ni dgug bya ste //
T02D2339:304b-18: sgo bzhi 'dab ma bzhi pa la //
T02D2339:304b-19: ge sar rgyan gyis dge byas pa //
T02D2339:304b-20: de yi dbus na nges phyung ba'i //
T02D2339:304b-21: bandhu ka mtshungs sa bon dmar //
T02D2339:304b-22: de nas 'khor lo la gnas lnga //
T02D2339:305a-0: @305a * // nag po 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs //
T02D2339:305a-1: 'jigs byed ces byar bsgrags pa ni //
T02D2339:305a-3: gnyis pa lte ba'i dbus gnas shing //
T02D2339:305a-4: lag 'gro'i rnam par rab nyal pa //
T02D2339:305a-5: de la 'khyil bar bsgrags pa ste //
T02D2339:305a-6: 'char dang nub pa'i rgyu yin no //
T02D2339:305a-7: me yi sa bon re phas kyang //
T02D2339:305a-8: gru gsum pa can me yi lha //
T02D2339:305a-9: kha dog dmar zhing lus che ba //
T02D2339:305a-11: gsum pa snying ga'i 'khor lo ni //
T02D2339:305a-12: sum cu rtsa drug 'dab mar khyab //
T02D2339:305a-14: nyi ma dang mnyam gzi brjid can //
T02D2339:305a-16: lte ba'i ze'u 'bru la gnas pa //
T02D2339:305a-17: n'a da thig ler yang dag ldan //
T02D2339:305a-18: sems kyi rdo rje de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2339:305a-19: bzhi pa mgrin ba la gnas pa'i //
T02D2339:305a-20: rtsa yi tshogs kyi spyod yul ni //
T02D2339:305a-21: rtsa rnams thams cad tshogs pa ste //
T02D2339:305a-22: rdzu 'phrul la sogs spyod yul lo //
T02D2339:305a-24: gsung gi rdo rje de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2339:305a-25: rkan dang mgrin pa rnam dag che //
T02D2339:305a-26: kha dog dmar po dpal ldan che //
T02D2339:305a-27: lnga pa tshangs pa'i bug par ni //
T02D2339:305a-28: dus gsum nam mkha'i spyod yul te //
T02D2339:305a-29: nam mkha' las 'das mchog tu phra //
T02D2339:305a-30: thig le'i gzugs can dbyangs dbang phyug /'khor lo'i nges pa drug pa rkan //
T02D2339:305a-31: lha rnams kyis kyang rnyed dka' ba //
T02D2339:305a-32: zla ba chu shel dang mtshungs pa //
T02D2339:305a-33: 'dzag pa zhes bya bsam par bya //
T02D2339:305a-34: so gnyis bdud rtsi'i cha shas rigs kyi ni //
T02D2339:305a-35: 'khor lor gnas pa sku yi rdo rje ste //
T02D2339:305a-36: de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog dkar po che //
T02D2339:305a-37: ral pa'i cod pan la brgyan dpal ldan no //
T02D2339:305a-38: de bzhin spyi bo'i rtsa bar ni //
T02D2339:305a-39: 'khor lo zla ba zlum pos brgyan //
T02D2339:305a-40: chos kyi dbyings dang de bzhin lha //
T02D2339:305a-41: thig le yi ni gzugs rang bzhin //
T02D2339:305a-42: ye shes rnam shes sbyor ba dang //
T02D2339:305b-0: sum cu'i dbang phyug @305b khyab byad de //
T02D2339:305b-1: rdzu 'phrul dngos grub sbyin pa dang //
T02D2339:305b-2: thar pa'i lam sbyin de zhes bya'o //
T02D2339:305b-3: bdag gi rnal 'byor zhes bya ba //
T02D2339:305b-4: tog rtse ba'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2339:305b-6: // / rgya gar shar phyogs sang na ga ra'i mkhas
T02D2339:305b-7: pa chen po nags kyi rin chen gyi spyan sngar
